about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Frontend developer who cares about results

description.paragraph-1: I build modern, fast, and intuitive web interfaces. I work with TypeScript, React, and the modern frontend ecosystem to turn ideas into reliable, thoughtful, and user-friendly applications. My goal is not just to write code, but to create products people enjoy using.
description.paragraph-2: I combine an engineering mindset with an eye for detail — writing clean, maintainable code, using type safety, and designing architectures that scale. I constantly learn new tools and approaches to build solutions that are fast, stable, and aesthetically refined.

project-1.title: Website for BEST Ekaterinburg UrFU
project-1.description: Developed a responsive website for the European student organization BEST.

project-2.title: Whiteboard for BEST Ekaterinburg UrFU
project-2.description: Built a real-time collaborative whiteboard using Next.js, TypeScript, and Convex. Focused on interaction speed and smooth data synchronization.

contact.title: Let’s Work Together
contact.description: I’m always open to new challenges and collaborations. If you’re looking for a developer who takes ownership, pays attention to detail, and turns design into a living product — feel free to reach out.
